all_violations.description: waitForTimeout() introduces timing flakiness.
all_violations.suggestion: Replace with condition-based waits (locator assertions / waitForResponse).
all_violations.code_snippet:
// Wait briefly for any potential update
      await page.waitForTimeout(300);

all_violations.description: new Date() is used in test logic; behavior can drift over time.
all_violations.suggestion: Prefer deterministic timestamps or controlled clock utilities.

top_10_recommendations.recommendation: Avoid Date.now/new Date in assertions without clock control.
Use deterministic test data builders for repeatable runs.
Split specs over 300 lines by user journey or test ID group.
Extract repeated setup steps into helper fixtures/functions.
Keep each test focused on one behavior with concise assertions.
Add explicit negative/error path tests for each critical flow.
Map each P0/P1 acceptance criterion to at least one assertion-backed test.
Expand edge-case assertions where only happy paths exist.
Keep setup/teardown scoped to each test or describe block.
